channel.title: [wL-Czar] Check if an object is near you?

item.title: [wL-Czar] Check if an object is near you?
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

I’m working on my Allstar’s FireMaking, the problem is that walkTo will go west even if an object is there… I need to know how to check if and object is there: I’ve tried this

for (int i = 0; i < server.objectHandler.MaxObjects; i++) {

and changed the walkTo code to

if (c.absX-1 != server.objectHandler.ObjectX[i]) {
c.walkTo(-1, 0);
c.viewTo(-2, 0);
}

but that doesn’t work. So what would I have to do to (is there a method, do I need one, or what) check if an object is absX-1 or absX+1, absY-1 or absY+1?

Read full topic
item.source: [wL-Czar] Check if an object is near you?
